topic.title: Associate documents
topic.shortdesc: Associated documents can be managed from the tab Documents

body.p: The additional information is stored in the form of external documents which are files uploaded into GLPI (see ). From the tab Documents, it is possible to associate and dissociate user selected documents. To manage the documents themselves, see .

It is also possible to create a document quickly through this tab, specify the desired file, and optionally the topic where the new document should be placed. The document name will be created based on the file name added.
